title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 845.4 - Lease of equipment and driver
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 845.4 - Lease of equipment and driver

State Regulations
(a) An authorized carrier may not lease equipment with drivers or provide drivers
alone to a noncarrier. (b) Notwithstanding any other provision, the lease of both a driver and vehicle to
a noncarrier by any one person for service covered by article 8 and/or 9 of the

Transportation Law will be deemed to be transportation subject to the
jurisdiction of the Commissioner of Transportation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
845.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
